net.sf.borg.model

Class TaskModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.borg.model.Model
      • net.sf.borg.model.TaskModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CalendarEntityProvider, Model.Listener, Searchable<KeyedEntity<?>>

    public class TaskModel
extends Model
implements Model.Listener, CalendarEntityProvider, Searchable<KeyedEntity<?>>
    TaksModel manages all of the task related entities - Task, Project, Subtask, and Tasklog

    • Nested Class Summary
